# bloggingPlatformAwsLambda

ALL the pointers metioned in the assignment sheet have been implemented except the aws s3 bucket.
I will be happy to give a walkthrough in my aws account and show all the configurations Used for 
1. Lambda Functions
2. Cognito
3. DynamoDB

Below are the CURLs to access the functions 
    //command to get new auth token ----> aws cognito-idp admin-initiate-auth --user-pool-id us-east-1_VqzCDJv8t --client-id 6rrobqvsmr2d6t4juhcpmgnkfh  --auth-flow ADMIN_NO_SRP_AUTH --auth-parameters USERNAME=nits.dahiya@gmail.com,PASSWORD=Test@123

the auth token is valid for very less time so please feel free to reach out so that i can generate a new auth token and share

CREATE BLOG POST CURL

curl --location 'https://k6rkqv8xgj.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev' \
--header 'Authorization: eyJraWQiOiJ2YTFUWXdnOFhqcGpyVUVxS0NpYlI1d0pReDJhaUk0QVp5K1lmRHc4eUpZPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..UMr1Y24HJB5QEKvG_hnMWWecU5yjZlukUWGxTFABJcYa6Qg9tGQEuqPlVr-TnNbFCx6pQNTTU1ULM6Ze6CUANLCz0TJpvtDE1CofZVZ2HzU6zTJR74EpIvx8GB-g9lTRMupk9o2_gFUMAIIqqxZVP5YV0hyVrlKlf4vnaMGbEJXQmddxS__VDH773YXpIrYBARPEnM-nhOgX8O7jAo6fT-VPy_UXCbsdRcWis8zNJOmnfdXfomZFK09KDdLUm7KsYouw5mNDT6XqFORz-P60-Z-9fV3-rf-zRQT01cdYoXBLSuG6bL_2LYg2u_9TML2kZ_MEQeD-HfG9cGipMUYFHA' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "content" : "this is the content abcccccc",
    "title" : "this is the title xyzggf"
}'


READ BLOG POST CURL

curl --location 'https://k6rkqv8xgj.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev?postId=2f37622d-af16-4eb8-9122-a0f12a8e3670' \
--header 'Authorization: eyJraWQiOiJ2YTFUWXdnOFhqcGpyVUVxS0NpYlI1d0pReDJhaUk0QVp5K1lmRHc4eUpZPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..UMr1Y24HJB5QEKvG_hnMWWecU5yjZlukUWGxTFABJcYa6Qg9tGQEuqPlVr-TnNbFCx6pQNTTU1ULM6Ze6CUANLCz0TJpvtDE1CofZVZ2HzU6zTJR74EpIvx8GB-g9lTRMupk9o2_gFUMAIIqqxZVP5YV0hyVrlKlf4vnaMGbEJXQmddxS__VDH773YXpIrYBARPEnM-nhOgX8O7jAo6fT-VPy_UXCbsdRcWis8zNJOmnfdXfomZFK09KDdLUm7KsYouw5mNDT6XqFORz-P60-Z-9fV3-rf-zRQT01cdYoXBLSuG6bL_2LYg2u_9TML2kZ_MEQeD-HfG9cGipMUYFHA'




UPDATE BLOG POST CURL

curl --location --request PUT 'https://k6rkqv8xgj.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev?postId=2f37622d-af16-4eb8-9122-a0f12a8e3670' \
--header 'Authorization: eyJraWQiOiJ2YTFUWXdnOFhqcGpyVUVxS0NpYlI1d0pReDJhaUk0QVp5K1lmRHc4eUpZPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..UMr1Y24HJB5QEKvG_hnMWWecU5yjZlukUWGxTFABJcYa6Qg9tGQEuqPlVr-TnNbFCx6pQNTTU1ULM6Ze6CUANLCz0TJpvtDE1CofZVZ2HzU6zTJR74EpIvx8GB-g9lTRMupk9o2_gFUMAIIqqxZVP5YV0hyVrlKlf4vnaMGbEJXQmddxS__VDH773YXpIrYBARPEnM-nhOgX8O7jAo6fT-VPy_UXCbsdRcWis8zNJOmnfdXfomZFK09KDdLUm7KsYouw5mNDT6XqFORz-P60-Z-9fV3-rf-zRQT01cdYoXBLSuG6bL_2LYg2u_9TML2kZ_MEQeD-HfG9cGipMUYFHA' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data '{
    "content" : "this is the new content",
    "title" : "this is the  new title"
}'


DELETE BLOG POST CURL

curl --location --request DELETE 'https://k6rkqv8xgj.execute-api.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/dev?postId=2f37622d-af16-4eb8-9122-a0f12a8e3670' \
--header 'Authorization: eyJraWQiOiJ2YTFUWXdnOFhqcGpyVUVxS0NpYlI1d0pReDJhaUk0QVp5K1lmRHc4eUpZPSIsImFsZyI6IlJTMjU2In0..UMr1Y24HJB5QEKvG_hnMWWecU5yjZlukUWGxTFABJcYa6Qg9tGQEuqPlVr-TnNbFCx6pQNTTU1ULM6Ze6CUANLCz0TJpvtDE1CofZVZ2HzU6zTJR74EpIvx8GB-g9lTRMupk9o2_gFUMAIIqqxZVP5YV0hyVrlKlf4vnaMGbEJXQmddxS__VDH773YXpIrYBARPEnM-nhOgX8O7jAo6fT-VPy_UXCbsdRcWis8zNJOmnfdXfomZFK09KDdLUm7KsYouw5mNDT6XqFORz-P60-Z-9fV3-rf-zRQT01cdYoXBLSuG6bL_2LYg2u_9TML2kZ_MEQeD-HfG9cGipMUYFHA'
